sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Judicial Circuits Districting Act of 2022.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Judicial Circuits Districting Act of 2022.

sections.heading: Circuit of Cook County.  On and after December 2, 2024, the Circuit of Cook County is divided into 20 subcircuits as follows:

sections.heading: The Judicial Circuits Apportionment
sections.text: Act of 2005 is repealed on December 2, 2024.

sections.heading: The Cook County Circuit Apportionment Act of 1991 is repealed on December 2, 2024.
sections.text: The Cook County Circuit Apportionment Act of 1991 is repealed on December 2, 2024.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
